criteria: Accuracy in identifying and drawing shapes with specified attributes (angles, equal faces).
Ability to differentiate between triangles, quadrilaterals, pentagons, hexagons, and cubes.
descriptions: Unable to recognize or draw basic shapes; shows no understanding of attributes.
Struggles to identify and draw shapes; frequently confuses attributes.
Identifies and draws some shapes correctly but makes several errors with attributes.
Generally accurately identifies and draws shapes with mostly correct attributes.
Accurately identifies and draws shapes with correct attributes with only minor errors.
Consistently and accurately identifies and draws shapes with specified attributes; demonstrates a thorough understanding.
Unable to differentiate between different types of shapes.
Shows minimal understanding of differences between shapes; significant confusion.
Identifies some shapes correctly but confuses others frequently.
Can usually differentiate between shapes but occasionally makes mistakes.
Clearly differentiates between most shapes with only rare errors.
Consistently and accurately differentiates between triangles, quadrilaterals, pentagons, hexagons, and cubes.
Drawings are unclear, imprecise, and do not represent the specified shapes.
Drawings are rough and lack precision; shapes are poorly represented.
Drawings are somewhat clear but lack detail and precision.
Drawings are generally clear and represent the shapes adequately.
Drawings are clear, neat, and represent the shapes accurately.
Drawings are exceptionally clear, precise, and accurately represent the shapes and their attributes.
